org.alienideology.jcord.handle.guild

Interface IRoleManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleManager

    public interface IRoleManager
    IRoleManager - A manager that manages a role in the guild.
    Author:
    AlienIdeology

      • modifyName

        void modifyName(java.lang.String name)
        Modify the name of this role. Null or empty name will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        name - The new name.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the role is at a higher hierarchy position than the identity.

        Parameters:
        permissions - A new varargs of permissions.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the role is at a higher hierarchy position than the identity.

      • modifyColor

        void modifyColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Modify the role color.
        Parameters:
        color - The new color.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.

      • modifyIsSeparateListed

        void modifyIsSeparateListed(boolean isSeparateListed)
        Set if this role will be separate listed from online members.
        Parameters:
        isSeparateListed - If set to true, then the role will be separated listed.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the role is at a higher hierarchy position than the identity.

      • modifyCanMention

        void modifyCanMention(boolean canMention)
        Set if this role can be mentioned by anyone in the guild.
        Parameters:
        canMention - If set to true, then the role can be mentioned.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the role is at a higher hierarchy position than the identity.

      • changePosition

        void changePosition(int position)
        Change the position of a role. The position is calculated by counting up the position. The @everyone would be position 0, and the higher the position is, the higher the role is in the hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        position - The new position.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        HigherHierarchyException -
        • If the roles is at a higher hierarchy position than the identity.
        • If identity attempt to move the role to a position higher than the highest position of the identity's role.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • If the role is @everyone (default) role.
        • If the position is
          • smaller or equal to zero
            • or
          • greater than the total number of roles.
